across multiple sites with different content hero images animations and SEO rankings Owner Developer Hoyle Web Design March 2006 to January 2009 I work with clients to implement designs for their websites in various platforms Most of the work I do is PSD to WordPress theme or PSD to HTML for more simple pages Obtained new clientele while maintaining current projects Managed 2 employees while
